original_text: The people must bake 12 loaves of bread. They must use the best flour. They must weigh the flour for each loaf. They must use two tenths (2/10) of an ephah (4 litres).
korean_text: 너는 고운 가루를 가져다가 떡 열두 개를 굽되 각 덩이를 십분의 이 에바로 하여

sentences.original_text: The people must bake 12 loaves of bread.
They must use the best flour.
They must weigh the flour for each loaf.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 빵 하나당 밀가루를 무게로 재야 합니다.

sentences.original_text: They must use two tenths (2/10) of an ephah.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 에바의 십분之二(2/10)를 사용해야 합니다.
